verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> manifested <S%G5319><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to the disciples <S%G3101><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Tiberias <S%G5085><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G5319><s%> manifested himself on this wise <S%G3779><s%>.

There was <S%G2258><s%> together <S%G3674><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus <S%G1324><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Cana <S%G2580><s%> in Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sons of Zebedee <S%G2199><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> other <S%G243><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>.

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, I go <S%G5217><s%> a fishing <S%G232><s%>. They say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, We <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>. They <S%G2117><s%> went forth <S%G1831><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%>; and2532, 1722 that <S%G1565><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> they took <S%G4084><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%>.

But when <S%G1161><s%> day <S%G4405><s%> was now <S%G2235><s%> breaking <S%G1096><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the beach <S%G123><s%>: yet <S%G3305><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Children <S%G3813><s%>, have ye2192, 3361 aught <S%G5100><s%> to eat <S%G4371><s%>? They answered <S%G611><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, No <S%G3756><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Cast <S%G906><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> side <S%G3313><s%> of the boat <S%G4143><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall find <S%G2147><s%>. They cast <S%G906><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G2089><s%> they were <S%G2480><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> able <S%G2480><s%> to draw <S%G1670><s%> it <S%G846><s%> for <S%G575><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of fishes <S%G2486><s%>.

That <S%G1565><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto Peter <S%G4074><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>. So when <S%G3767><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, he girt <S%G1241><s%> his coat <S%G1903><s%> about him <S%G1063><s%> (for he was <S%G2258><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%>), and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the other <S%G243><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came in <S%G2064><s%> the little boat <S%G4142><s%> (for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> far <S%G3112><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%>, but235, 5613 about <S%G575><s%> two hundred <S%G1250><s%> cubits <S%G4083><s%> off <S%G4951><s%>), dragging the net <S%G1350><s%> full of fishes <S%G2486><s%>.

So <S%G5613><s%> when <S%G3767><s%> they got out <S%G576><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%>, they see <S%G991><s%> a fire of coals <S%G439><s%> there <S%G2749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fish <S%G3795><s%> laid thereon <S%G1945><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Bring <S%G5342><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the fish <S%G3795><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye have <S%G4084><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> taken <S%G4084><s%>.

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore went up <S%G305><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> drew <S%G1670><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> land <S%G1093><s%>, full <S%G3324><s%> of great <S%G3173><s%> fishes <S%G2486><s%>, a hundred <S%G1540><s%> and fifty and <S%G2532><s%> three <S%G4004><s%>: and for all there were <S%G5607><s%> so many <S%G5118><s%>, the net <S%G1350><s%> was <S%G4977><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> rent <S%G4977><s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Come <S%G1205><s%> and break your fast <S%G709><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> durst <S%G5111><s%> inquire <S%G1833><s%> of him <S%G846><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%>? knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Jesus2424, 3767 cometh <S%G2064><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> taketh <S%G2983><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> giveth <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the fish <S%G3795><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%>.

This <S%G5124><s%> is now <S%G2235><s%> the third time <S%G5154><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was manifested <S%G5319><s%> to the <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, after that he was risen <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>.

So <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they had broken their fast <S%G709><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> to Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>, Simon <S%G4613><s%>, son of John <S%G2495><s%>, lovest thou <S%G25><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> more than <S%G4119><s%> these <S%G5130><s%>? He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Yea <S%G3483><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>; thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G5368><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>. He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Feed <S%G1006><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> lambs <S%G5130><s%>.

He saith <S%G3004><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> a second time <S%G1208><s%>, Simon <S%G4613><s%>, son of John <S%G2495><s%>, lovest thou <S%G25><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>? He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Yea <S%G3483><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>; thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G5368><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>. He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Tend <S%G4165><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%>.

He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> the third time <S%G5154><s%>, Simon <S%G4613><s%>, son of John <S%G2495><s%>, lovest thou <S%G5368><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>? Peter <S%G4074><s%> was grieved <S%G3076><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> the third time <S%G5154><s%>, Lovest thou <S%G5368><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>? And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>; thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G5368><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>. Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Feed <S%G1006><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, When <S%G3753><s%> thou wast <S%G2258><s%> young <S%G3501><s%>, thou girdedst <S%G2224><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> walkedst <S%G4043><s%> whither <S%G3699><s%> thou wouldest <S%G2309><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> thou shalt be old <S%G1095><s%>, thou shalt stretch forth <S%G1614><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> shall gird <S%G2224><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> carry <S%G5342><s%> thee whither <S%G3699><s%> thou wouldest <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

Now this <S%G5124><s%> he <S%G2036><s%> spake <S%G4591><s%>, signifying by what <S%G4169><s%> manner of death <S%G2288><s%> he should glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> when he had spoken <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>, turning about <S%G1994><s%>, seeth <S%G991><s%> the disciple <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> following <S%G190><s%>; who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> leaned <S%G377><s%> back on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> breast <S%G4738><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the supper <S%G1173><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, who <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> betrayeth <S%G3860><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>?

Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore seeing <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G5126><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall this man do <S%G3778><s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> I will that <S%G2309><s%> he <S%G846><s%> tarry <S%G3306><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> is that to <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>? Follow <S%G190><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> should <S%G599><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> die <S%G599><s%>: yet <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said2036, 3754 not <S%G3756><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, that he should <S%G599><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> die <S%G599><s%>; but <S%G235><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> I will that <S%G2309><s%> he <S%G846><s%> tarry <S%G3306><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> is that to <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>?

This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the disciple <S%G3101><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> beareth witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> these things <S%G5130><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true <S%G227><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> there are <S%G2076><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other things <S%G243><s%> which <S%G3745><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did <S%G4160><s%>, the which <S%G3748><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they should be written <S%G1125><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>, I suppose that <S%G3633><s%> even the world <S%G2889><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> would <S%G5562><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> contain <S%G5562><s%> the books <S%G975><s%> that should be written <S%G1125><s%>.
